content.rendered:
Course Summary

The course is designed to combine a quality lesson and workshop programme with safety training to provide an enjoyable and worthwhile learning experience for insurance claims personnel and risk managers. We believe it is the only course of its kind currently available.

The course will be held at the Royal Southern Yacht Club, selected for its stunning location and maritime traditions to provide an excellent training environment. AqualisBraemar personnel will present the lectures and workshop programme and the physical activities will be run by the Warsash Maritime College who will provide an OPITO approved ‘HUET with re-breather’ course.

Next Course Date will be 17th-19th June 2020

To register your interest please contact Lisa Zaman using the form below:

jetpack-related-posts.title: Ship Familiarisation Course – Dubai
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Course Summary Drydocks World Dubai, Jebel Ali Port and Mubarak Marine, together with AqualisBraemar, have organised a Ship Familiarisation Course targeted at the local and international shipping industry and intended to familiarize professionals in the industry with ships, ship repair, casualties and have a more hands on view of the…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Shipyard Acquaint Course – Piraeus
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Target Audience With a specific focus to people working in Marine Claims Course Summary A short intensive three day course with the aim of introducing marine insurance professionals to the basic technical aspects of damage encountered in marine losses, their surveying, investigating and reporting techniques. Course Objectives The course is…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Marine Risk Management
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar has extensive experience in risk identification and marine risk management in concept development, detailed design, engineering, temporary phases and operations of both oil & gas offshore assets and the renewable energy sector.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Offshore Rig Moving
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Our teams are fully experienced with both jack up and floating units. We offer full engineering assessments for site specific location approvals, and provide both Marine Warranty Surveyors and Rigmovers/Towmasters for offshore attendance during rig moves.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Construction Supervision & Offshore Project Management
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Our project management team monitor the project to ensure that it is carried out in accordance with the contract, the specifications, Client’s expectations, flag and Class requirements.
